descriptionHtml:
This little mod allows you to craft the Nightingale Armor and Weapons without the Enchantments.
Armor can be crafted in light and heavy version. The textures for both Armors are the original ones. So if you change the textures for the Nightingale Armor, this Armor's texture will be changed, too.

For crafting the Armor you need the 'Advanced Armors' perk in Smithing. You will find the pieces under 'Daedric'.

The costs for the Armor pieces and the Weapons are the same as for the Daedric Armor pieces and Weapons. But instead of a Daedra Heart you will need Void Salts.
Void Salts are also required for upgrading.
All pieces and Weapons are enchantable.

The stats for the light Armor are the same as the level 32+ Nightingale Armor:
Shadow Armor: 34 Armor; 12 Weight
Shadow Hood: 15 Armor, 2 Weight
Shadow Gloves: 10 Armor, 2 Weight
Shadow Boots: 10 Armor, 2 Weight

The stats for the heavy Armor are the same as the Daedric Armor:
Heavy Shadow Armor: 49 Armor; 50 Weight
Heavy Shadow Helmet: 23 Armor, 15 Weight
Heavy Shadow Gauntlets: 18 Armor, 6 Weight
Heavy Shadow Boots: 18 Armor, 10 Weight

The stas for the Weapons are similar to the Daedric Weapons:
Shadow Blade: 14 Damage, 15 Weight
Shadow Bow: 19 Damage, 18 Weight
